description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the front-end interface for visualizing database content. It includes styling and scripts to list databases and tables, fetch data via API calls, and display data in a table with expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML to display data rows in a table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders an individual cell, handling different data types and expandability.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for full view.
